ÈôÑÂΩï GitHub ‰∏äÈù¢ÂèØ‰ª•‰∏ãËΩΩ ÂÆåÊï¥ Demo Êé®Ëçê‰πãÂâçÂÜôÂú® CSDN ‰∏äÁöÑÂçöÊñá: iOS UI ÊäÄÂ∑ß: ËßÜÂõæÊó†Ê≥ïË¢´ÁÇπÂáª ÂèØÂÖ≥Ê≥®ÊàëÁöÑÂæÆ‰ø°ÂÖ¨‰ºóÂè∑:

entry.title: RN: Ê®°Êãü Mobx
entry.content: ÂâçË®ÄÁúãËøá [React Native ‰ΩøÁî® Mobx] ËøôÁØáÂçöÂÆ¢ÁöÑÂêåÂ≠¶, ÂØπ Mobx Â∫îËØ•Êúâ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÂçïÁõ¥ËßÇÁöÑËÆ§ËØÜ. ÂÖ∂ÂÆû, Êàë‰ª¨ÂÆåÂÖ®ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® RN ‰∏≠ÁöÑ State Êù•ËææÂà∞ÂêåÊ†∑ÁöÑÊïàÊûú. ‰ªäÂ§©ÁöÑ‰∏ªË¶ÅÂÜÖÂÆπÊòØ‰ΩøÁî® State Êù•Ê®°Êãü Mobx, ‰πüÁÆóÊòØÂØπ Mobx ÁöÑËøõ‰∏ÄÊ≠•ËÆ§ËØÜ. ÊïàÊûú ÂÆûÁé∞ÊïàÊûúÂíå [React Native ‰ΩøÁî® Mobx] ‰∏≠ÁöÑÊïàÊûú‰∏ÄËá¥, Âè™ÊòØ‰ª£Á†ÅÊ≤°Êúâ‰ΩøÁî® Mobx Ê°ÜÊû∂. ÂÆûÁé∞LegacyCounter.js Add Âíå Minus ‰∏§‰∏™ÊåâÈíÆÂàÜÂà´Ëß¶ÂèëÂêÑËá™ÁöÑÂõûË∞É, Êù•Êõ¥Êñ∞ state.‰ΩøÁî® state ÁöÑÂèòÂåñÊù•Âà∞ËææÊõ¥Êñ∞ View (ËÆ°Êï∞ÁöÑ Text ‰ºöÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑÂÅöÂá∫ÂèòÂåñ)ÁöÑÁõÆÁöÑ. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869/** * Ê®°Êãü Mobx Âú® ReactNative ‰∏äÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞è‰æãÂ≠ê. * * state -> view */'use strict';import React, { Component } from 'react';import { StyleSheet, View, Text, TouchableHighlight} from 'react-native';class LegacyCounter extends Component { //ÊûÑÈÄ†ÊñπÊ≥ï constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { //ËÆ°Êï∞ counter: 0 }; } render () { return ( <View style = {styles.container}> {/*Âä†‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {this.setState({ counter: ++this.state.counter })}}> <Text>Add</Text> </TouchableHighlight> {/* ÊòæÁ§∫Â§ÑÁêÜÁªìÊûú */} <Text style = {styles.resultTxtStyle}> {this.state.counter} </Text> {/*Âáè‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {this.setState({ counter: --this.state.counter })}}> <Text>Minus</Text> </TouchableHighlight> </View> ); }}export default class LegacyComponent extends Component { render () { return ( <View style = {{flex: 1, marginTop: 64}}> <LegacyCounter/> </View> ); }}/* Ê†∑ÂºèÂÆö‰πâ */const styles = StyleSheet.create({ container: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around' }, resultTxtStyle: { fontSize: 22, color: 'red' }}); index.ios.js Ëøô‰∏™Êñá‰ª∂ÂæàÁÆÄÂçï, Âè™ÊòØË∞ÉÁî® LegacyCounter ‰∏≠ÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂. 1234567891011121314import React, { Component } from 'react';//ÂºïÂÖ•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ®°Âùóimport LegacyComponent from './js/Mobx/LegacyCounter'import { AppRegistry} from 'react-native';class RNMobxDemo extends Component { render() { return( <LegacyComponent/> ); }}AppRegistry.registerComponent('RNMobxDemo', () => MZRNTutorial); ÂêéËÆ∞Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ÊÉ≥‰∫ÜËß£Êõ¥Â§öÂÖ≥‰∫é RN ‰∏≠ State ÁöÑÁü•ËØÜ, ËØ∑ÁßªÊ≠•ÂÆòÊñπÊñáÊ°£Êü•ÈòÖ State ÁöÑÁî®Ê≥ï. ÂêéÁª≠‰ºöÁªôÂ§ßÂÆ∂Â∏¶Êù•Êõ¥Â§öÂÖ≥‰∫é RN Ëøô‰∫õÊñπÈù¢ÁöÑ‰∏úË•ø.

entry.title: RN: ‰ΩøÁî® Mobx
entry.content: Êù•Áî±Âú® JSFiddler ‰∏äÈù¢ÁúãÂà∞ React ÁªìÂêà Mobx ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™Â∞è‰æãÂ≠ê. Áà±‰∏çÈáäÊâã, ÈÅÇÊãøÊù•ÊîπÈÄ†‰∏Ä‰∏ã, ËÆ©ÂÖ∂ËÉΩÂú® RN ‰∏äÈù¢‰∏ÄÂ±ïÈõÑÈ£é. ‰πãÂâçÂê¨Ëøá Mobx, ËØ¥ÊòØË¶ÅÊõø‰ª£ Redux, ÂèçÊ≠£ÊàëÊòØ‰∏çÁü•ÈÅìËøô‰∫õ‰∏ú‰∏ú, Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°Âê¨ËØ¥Ê≤°Êúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÊÑüËßâ!Â¶Ç‰ªäÂèàÂÜçÊ¨°ÂÅ∂ÈÅá Mobx, ÂÜ≥ÂÆöËÆ§ÁúüÂ≠¶‰π†‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂÆÉ. Mobx ÁÆÄ‰ªãMobx ÁöÑ github Âú∞ÂùÄ.ÁõÆÂâçÂÖ≥‰∫é‰ªñÂíå React Native ÁöÑ(‰∏≠Êñá)ËµÑÊñô‰∏çÂ§ö, Â§ßÂ§öÊï∞ÊòØÂÖ≥‰∫é React ÁöÑ. ÁúãÊù•ÊÉ≥Â≠¶Â•Ω React Native, ËøòÊòØË¶ÅÂÅöÂ•Ω React ÁöÑÂäüËØæÂëÄ! ÂÆòÁΩëÁªô‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ Mobx ÁöÑÂõæ: Êàë‰πüÊòØÂàöÊé•Ëß¶Ëøô‰∏™„ÄåÁâõÈÄºÈó™Èó™„ÄçÁöÑ Mobx, ÂÖ±Âãâ! ÊïàÊûúÂõæ‰ªäÂ§©ÁöÑ‰æãÂ≠êÂæàÁÆÄÂçï, ÊïàÊûúÂõæÂ¶Ç‰∏ã ÁÇπÂáª Add ÁÇπÂáª Minus ‰∏ãÈù¢ÂÖ∑‰ΩìËØ¥ËØ¥Â¶Ç‰ΩïÊêûÂÆöËøô‰∏™ Demo. ÂáÜÂ§á„ÄåÊùêÊñô„ÄçËøôÈáåÂÅáËÆæ‰Ω†Â∑≤ÁªèÂÖ∑Â§á React Native ÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨ÂºÄÂèëÁéØÂ¢É, Ëá≥Â∞ëÊàêÂäüËøêË°åËøá‰∏ÄÊ¨° React Native ÁöÑÁ®ãÂ∫è. 1.ÂàõÂª∫ React Native È°πÁõÆ1react-native init RNMobxDemo ‰Ω†‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Áªô‰Ω†ÁöÑÂ∑•Á®ãÂèñ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰Ω†ÂñúÊ¨¢ÁöÑÂêçÂ≠ó.ËøôÈáåÂßë‰∏îÁß∞‰πã‰∏∫ RNMobxDemo 2.ÂÆâË£Ö mobx Âíå mobx-react1npm i mobx mobx-react --save 3.Counter.js ËØ•Êñá‰ª∂‰ΩøÁî®‰∫Ü mobx Âíå mobx-react ÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂. ÂÖ∑‰Ωì‰ª£Á†Å: 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768'use strict';import React, { Component } from 'react';import { StyleSheet, View, Text, TouchableHighlight} from 'react-native';import { observer } from 'mobx-react/native';import { observable } from 'mobx';// Ë¢´ËßÇÂØüËÄÖ, ËßÇÂØü counter ÂèòÈáè const storer = observable({ counter: 0});//---------------------------------// ES6 ÂÜôÊ≥ï: Arrow Function//---------------------------------storer.plus = () => { storer.counter ++;};storer.minus = () => { storer.counter --;};class Counter extends Component { render () { return ( <View style = {styles.container}> {/*Âä†‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {this.props.store.plus()}}> <Text>Add</Text> </TouchableHighlight> {/* ÊòæÁ§∫Â§ÑÁêÜÁªìÊûú */} <Text style = {styles.resultTxtStyle}> {this.props.store.counter} </Text> {/*Âáè‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {storer.minus()}}> <Text>Minus</Text> </TouchableHighlight> </View> ); }}// ‰ΩøÁî® observer ÂàõÂª∫const CounterComponent = observer(Counter);export default class ReactionsComponent extends Component { render () { return ( <View style = {{flex: 1, marginTop: 64}}> <CounterComponent store = {storer} /> </View> ); }}/* Ê†∑ÂºèÂÆö‰πâ */const styles = StyleSheet.create({ container: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around' }, resultTxtStyle: { fontSize: 22, color: 'red' }}); 4.index.ios.js ËØ•Êñá‰ª∂‰ΩøÁî®Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÁªÑ‰ª∂ ReactionsComponent ÂÖ∑‰Ωì‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã: 1234567891011121314import React, { Component } from 'react';//ÂºïÂÖ•Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ®°Âùóimport ReactionsComponent from './js/Mobx/Counter'import { AppRegistry} from 'react-native';class RNMobxDemo extends Component { render() { return( <ReactionsComponent/> ); }}AppRegistry.registerComponent('RNMobxDemo', () => MZRNTutorial); Mobx ÊîØÊåÅ„ÄåÊ≥®Ëß£„Äç. ËøôÈáåÁöÑÊ≥®Ëß£Â∞±ÊòØ ES7 ‰∏≠ÁöÑ decorators (Ë£ÖÈ•∞ËÄÖÊ®°Âºè). ‰∏ãÈù¢‰ª£Á†ÅÊòØ‰ΩøÁî®Ê≥®Ëß£ÁöÑÊñπÂºèÊù•Â£∞Êòé, ‰ΩÜÊòØ‰Ω†ÈúÄË¶ÅÂÆâË£ÖÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÊèí‰ª∂(babel plugin)Êù•ÊîØÊåÅ. ÂÆâË£ÖËØ•Êèí‰ª∂ÂæàÁÆÄÂçï, Âú®È°πÁõÆÊ†πÁõÆÂΩïÊåâÁÖß‰∏ãÈù¢Ê≠•È™§Âç≥ÂèØ: Step 1: ÂàõÂª∫ .babelrc Êñá‰ª∂ 1touch .babelrc Step 2: ÁºñËæë .babelrc Êñá‰ª∂ 1234{ 'presets': ['react-native'], 'plugins': ['transform-decorators-legacy']} Step 3: ÂÆâË£ÖÊèí‰ª∂ 1npm i babel-plugin-transform-decorators-legacy babel-preset-react-native-stage-0 --save-dev ‰øÆÊîπ„ÄåCounter.js„Äç, ‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667'use strict';import React, { Component } from 'react';import { StyleSheet, View, Text, TouchableHighlight} from 'react-native';import { observer } from 'mobx-react/native';import { observable } from 'mobx';// Ë¢´ËßÇÂØüËÄÖ, ËßÇÂØü counter ÂèòÈáè const storer = observable({ counter: 0});//---------------------------------// ES6 ÂÜôÊ≥ï: Arrow Function//---------------------------------storer.plus = () => { storer.counter ++;};storer.minus = () => { storer.counter --;};@observer //‰ΩøÁî®@ÊñπÂºèÊù•ÂâçÁΩÆÂ£∞Êòéclass Counter extends Component { render () { return ( <View style = {styles.container}> {/*Âä†‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {this.props.store.plus()}}> <Text>Add</Text> </TouchableHighlight> {/* ÊòæÁ§∫Â§ÑÁêÜÁªìÊûú */} <Text style = {styles.resultTxtStyle}> {this.props.store.counter} </Text> {/*Âáè‰∏Ä*/} <TouchableHighlight onPress = {() => {storer.minus()}}> <Text>Minus</Text> </TouchableHighlight> </View> ); }}export default class ReactionsComponent extends Component { render () { return ( <View style = {{flex: 1, marginTop: 64}}> <Counter store = {storer} /> </View> ); }}/* Ê†∑ÂºèÂÆö‰πâ */const styles = StyleSheet.create({ container: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-around' }, resultTxtStyle: { fontSize: 22, color: 'red' }}); ‰ªé‰æãÂ≠êÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫, storer Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∫é state, ÂΩì state ÂèëÁîüÊîπÂèò‰∫Ü, ËßÜÂõæ View ‰πüË∑üÁùÄÂèòÂåñ.‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÁä∂ÊÄÅÈ©±Âä®. Android ÂºÄÂèëÁöÑÂêåÂ≠¶Â∫îËØ•Áü•ÈÅì Adapter Âíå notifyDatasetChanged ÁöÑÊú∫Âà∂, ÂΩìÊï∞ÊçÆÊ∫êÂèëÁîüÂèòÂåñÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄô, ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöÁü•ËßÜÂõæËøõË°åÂà∑Êñ∞Êìç‰Ωú. ËøôÈáåÁöÑ Mobx ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•Ëøô‰πàÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÁêÜËß£. Mobx ÁöÑÂº∫Â§ß‰πãÂ§ÑËøòÊúâÂæàÂ§ö, ÈúÄË¶ÅÊÖ¢ÊÖ¢Â≠¶‰π†ÂíåÊåñÊéò.

entry.title: RN: 0.34 ËøêË°åÂú® Android ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò
entry.content: ‰ªäÂ§©Èó≤Êù•Êó†‰∫ã, ÊÉ≥‰ΩøÁî® RN Â∑•Á®ãÂú® Android ËÆæÂ§á‰∏äÈù¢Ë∑ëË∑ë. ÊÉ≥ÁúãÁúãËøêË°åÊïàÊûúÊÄé‰πàÊ†∑?! ÈÄÇÂêàËØªËÄÖ Êúâ Android ÂºÄÂèëÂü∫Á°Ä. ‰ºö‰ΩøÁî® Android Studio. ÂàùÁ∫ß React Native ÁöÑÂºÄÂèëËÄÖ. ÂºÄÂèëÁéØÂ¢ÉÂíåÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ Android Studio 2.2 ReactNative 0.34 Android Ê®°ÊãüÂô® Mac Êìç‰ΩúÁ≥ªÁªü È¢ÑÊúüÊïàÊûú‰∏çÂá∫ÊâÄÊñô, ÁúüÁöÑ‰∏çËÉΩ‰∏ÄÂ∏ÜÈ£éÈ°∫ÁöÑ Run. Âú®ÊàëÁöÑÂçöÂÆ¢ ReactNative: ‰∏ç‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÁöÑ HelloWorld ‰∏≠Â±ïÁ§∫‰∫Ü RN Âú® iOS ‰∏äÈù¢ÁöÑËøêË°åÊÉÖÂÜµ. ‰ªäÂ§©ËøòÊòØËøô‰∏™‰æãÂ≠ê, ÈÉ®ÁΩ≤ÂíåËøêË°åÂà∞ Android ‰∏äÈù¢. ÊïàÊûúÂ¶Ç‰∏ã: Âú®Ëøô‰∏™ËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠, ÈÅáÂà∞Âá†‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢ò. ÁâπÊ≠§ËÆ∞ÂΩï. ÈóÆÈ¢òÊèèËø∞ÂíåËß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢ò1: Áõ¥Êé•ËøêË°å crashlog ÊèèËø∞(ÈÉ®ÂàÜ) E/AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: mainProcess: com.mzrntutorial, PID: 5849java.lang.RuntimeException:Unable to start activity ComponentInfo{com.mzrntutorial/com.mzrntutorial.MainActivity}: java.lang.ClassCastException: android.app.Application cannot be cast to com.facebook.react.ReactApplicationat android.app.ActivityThread.performLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:2416)at android.app.ActivityThread.handleLaunchActivity(ActivityThread.java:2476) Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°à:Manifest.xml ÈÖçÁΩÆ Application ÂêçÁß∞ android:name=‚Äù.MainApplication‚Äù ÈóÆÈ¢ò2:1could not get batchedbridge make sure your bundle is packaged correctly Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢ò1Âêé, ÂÜçÊ¨°ËøêË°å, ‰ºöÊä•ÈóÆÈ¢ò2.ËØ•ÈóÆÈ¢òÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫Ê≤°ÊúâÂêØÂä®Êú¨Âú∞ÁöÑ server. ‰ΩøÁî® Xcode ÂèØ‰ª•Ëá™Âä®ËøêË°åÊú¨Âú∞ server.ÂèØ‰ª•ÂèÇËÄÉÂçöÂÆ¢ React Native Â¶Ç‰ΩïÂêØÂä® local server Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°à:ÊâãÂä®ÂêØÂä® server. cd È°πÁõÆÊ†πÁõÆÂΩï 1react-native start ÈóÆÈ¢ò3: Ê®°ÊãüÂô®Ê≤°Êúâ menu ÊåâÈîÆ, Êó†Ê≥ï Reload Ëøô‰∏™ÂÖ∂ÂÆû‰∏çÊòØ‰ªÄ‰πàÂ§ßÈóÆÈ¢ò, ‰ΩÜÊòØÂØπ‰∫éÂàùÂ≠¶ËÄÖ, ‰πüÁÆóÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈóÆÈ¢ò. Êñ∞ÁâàÁöÑ Android SDK ÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊ®°ÊãüÂô®Ê≤°Êúâ menu ÊåâÈîÆ‰∫Ü Ëß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°à:ËøûÁª≠Êåâ‰∏§Ê¨°Â≠óÊØç r Âç≥ÂèØÂà∑Êñ∞. Ëøô‰∫õÈóÆÈ¢ò, FB ÂêéÈù¢ËÇØÂÆö‰ºöËß£ÂÜ≥ÁöÑ.ÈòøÈó®! ÈôÑÂΩï(‰ª£Á†Å)index.ios.js 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293import React, { Component } from 'react';import {getPlatformString, isIOS} from './js/Generals/Utils/IDSRNPlatformUtil';import MZButton from './js/ReactUIKit/MZButton'import { AppRegistry, StyleSheet, Text, View, Platform, TouchableOpacity, TouchableHighlight} from 'react-native';// Ë∞ÉÁî®ÂÖ∂‰ªñÊ®°ÂùóÊñπÊ≥ïvar os = getPlatformString();var iosPlatform = isIOS();//when run on 'ios' trueclass MZRNTutorial extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {status:1}; } customPressHandler = () => { alert('ÂΩìÂâçÁä∂ÊÄÅ: ' + this.state.status); this.state.status = 2; } render() { console.log('render ...'); return ( <View style={styles.container}> <Text style={styles.welcome}> Near use React Native! </Text> <Text style={styles.instructions}> To get started, edit index.android.js </Text> <Text style={styles.instructions}> Press 'R' twice to reload,{'\n'} or shake for dev menu </Text> {/* ÊòæÁ§∫ÂΩìÂâçÂπ≥Âè∞‰ø°ÊÅØ*/} <Text style={styles.welcome}> current os: {Platform.OS} </Text> {/* <TouchableOpacity style={styles.button} onPress={this.customPressHandler} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Á°ÆÂÆö</Text> </TouchableOpacity> */} <MZButton text="Á°ÆÂÆö?" bgColor="green" dianjishijian={()=>{alert('Â±ÖÁÑ∂ÁÇπÂáªÁ°ÆÂÆö?!')}}> </MZButton> </View> ); }}const styles = StyleSheet.create({ button: { height: 40, width: 150, borderRadius: 20, justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'green', overflow: 'hidden' }, buttonText: { textAlign: 'center', color: 'white' }, container: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: '#F5FCFF', }, welcome: { fontSize: 20, textAlign: 'center', margin: 10, }, instructions: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#333333', marginBottom: 5, }, flowRight: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', alignSelf: 'stretch' },});AppRegistry.registerComponent('MZRNTutorial', () => MZRNTutorial); MZButton.js 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455import React, { Component } from 'react';import { StyleSheet, Text, View, Platform, TouchableOpacity} from 'react-native';//-----------------------------------------------------//Â§ñÈÉ®‰ΩøÁî®ËØ•Ê®°Âùó, ES6ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠ó export default//-----------------------------------------------------export default class MZButton extends Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {status:1}; } costumPressHandler = () => { alert('ÂΩìÂâçÁä∂ÊÄÅ:' + this.state.status); const {dianjishijian} = this.props; dianjishijian(); }; // ‰ΩøÁî®Â±ûÊÄßÂÄºËÆæÁΩÆËÉåÊôØÈ¢úËâ≤ // style={[styles.button], {backgroundColor:this.props.beijingyanse}} render() { //Ëß£ÊûÑ const {text, bgColor} = this.props; return ( <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button], {backgroundColor:bgColor}} onPress = {this.costumPressHandler} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}> {/* ‰ΩøÁî®Â±ûÊÄßÂÄº */} {this.props.text} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> ) }}const styles = StyleSheet.create({ button: { height: 40, width: 150, borderRadius: 20, justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'green', overflow: 'hidden' }, buttonText: { textAlign: 'center', color: 'white' }}); entry.content: ÂàõÂª∫Êñá‰ª∂Â§π ES6123ES6-lib-src ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•‰ªªÊÑèÂèñ‰∏Ä‰∏™‰Ω†ÂñúÊ¨¢ÁöÑÁõÆÂΩïÂêçÁß∞. ÂàùÂßãÂåñÈ°πÁõÆ1npm init Â°´ÂÜôÈ°πÁõÆ‰ø°ÊÅØ. Êü•Áúã‰∏Ä‰∏ã package.json 1cat package.json 123456789101112131415{ "name": "es6tutorials", "version": "1.0.0", "description": "Tutorial", "main": "index.js", "scripts": { "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1" }, "keywords": [ "es6", ".etc" ], "author": "mark.zhang", "license": "MIT"} ÁõÆÂΩïÁªìÊûÑÂ¶Ç‰∏ã ÂÆâË£Ö babel-cli1npm install --save-dev babel-cli ‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂÆâË£Ö 1npm install babel-cli -g ÂÖ®Â±ÄÂÆâË£Ö‰∏äÂêéÔºå‰ºöÂÆâË£ÖÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÂõõ‰∏™Á®ãÂ∫èÂà∞ÂÖ®Â±ÄÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠Ôºö 1234babelbabel-nodebabel-doctorbabel-external-helpers ÂÆâË£Ö babel-core1npm install babel-core --save ÂÆâË£Ö ES2015 Êèí‰ª∂1npm install babel-preset-es2015 ÁºñÂÜôÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ .babelrc Ê≥®ÊÑèËØ•Êñá‰ª∂Êúâ‰∏™ÁÇπÁ¨¶Âè∑. Âú®Â∑•Á®ãÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÊñ∞Âª∫ËØ•Êñá‰ª∂ 1touch .babelrc ÂÜôÂÖ•Â¶Ç‰∏ãÂÜÖÂÆπ 123456{ "presets": [ "es2015", ], "plugins": []} ÁºñÂÜôÊµãËØï‰ª£Á†Å tutorials.js 12345678910111213141516171819202122function test(){ console.log(a); var a = 0;}test();var a = [];for (var i = 0; i < 10; i++) { var c = i; a[i] = function () { console.log(c); };}a[6](); // 9var b = [];for (var i=0; i<10; i++) { let c = i; //let ÊòØ es6‰∏≠ÁöÑÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠ó b[i] = function() { console.log(c) };}b[6](); ÁºñËØë 1babel src/tutorials.js ËøêË°å 1babel-node src/tutorials.js ËøôÈáåÂèØ‰ª•‰∏ãËΩΩ Â∑•Á®ãÊ∫êÁ†Å. ÂÖ∂‰ªñÊìç‰Ωú1.Â∞Ü ES6 ËØ≠Ê≥ïÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂ËΩ¨Êç¢‰∏∫ ES5 ÁöÑËØ≠Ê≥ï1babel -d lib/ src/ Âú® lib ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ã‰ºöÁîüÊàê src ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏≠ÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂. 2.ËøõÂÖ•‰∫§‰∫íÊ®°Âºè1babel-node ‰∏§Ê¨° ctrl+c ÈÄÄÂá∫ 3.Ê£ÄÊü•babelÁä∂ÂÜµ1babel-doctor Ê£ÄÊü•‰ª•‰∏ãÂÜÖÂÆπ ÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂.babelrc ÊòØÂê¶ÊúâÈáçÂ§çÁöÑbabelÂÆâË£ÖÂåÖÔºåÊØîÂ¶ÇËØ¥ÂÆâË£Ö‰∫Ü5Âíå6 babelÂÆâË£ÖÂåÖÊòØÂê¶Â∑≤ÁªèÂçáÁ∫ßÂà∞‰∫ÜÊúÄÊñ∞Áâà npm >= 3.3.0 4.Âç∏ËΩΩÂÖ®Â±ÄÁöÑ babel-cli1npm uninstall --global babel-cli ÊÑüË∞¢ Babel comes with a built-in CLI which can be used to compile files from the command line. ÈòÆ‰∏ÄÂ≥∞ËÄÅÂ∏àÁöÑ ECMAScript 6ÂÖ•Èó®

ÂÅáÂ¶ÇÂèØ‰ª•Âà§Êñ≠ÂΩìÂâçÊâãÊú∫ÊòØÂê¶ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫ÜÁΩëÁªú‰ª£ÁêÜ, Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÂæàÂ•ΩÂú∞Ëß£ÂÜ≥‰∏äÈù¢ÊÉÖÊôØ‰∏≠ÊèêÂà∞ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò‰∫Ü. ÊâæÂà∞Á∫øÁ¥¢Âú® ASIHttpRequest ‰∏≠ÊâæÂà∞Â¶Ç‰∏ãÊñπÊ≥ï: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243- (BOOL)configureProxies{ // Have details of the proxy been set on this request if (![self isPACFileRequest] && (![self proxyHost] && ![self proxyPort])) { // If not, we need to figure out what they'll be NSArray *proxies = nil; // Have we been given a proxy auto config file? if ([self PACurl]) { // If yes, we'll need to fetch the PAC file asynchronously, so we stop this request to wait until we have the proxy details. [self fetchPACFile]; return NO; // Detect proxy settings and apply them } else {#if TARGET_OS_IPHONE NSDictionary *proxySettings = [NSMakeCollectable(CFNetworkCopySystemProxySettings()) autorelease];#else NSDictionary *proxySettings = [NSMakeCollectable(SCDynamicStoreCopyProxies(NULL)) autorelease];#endif proxies = [NSMakeCollectable(CFNetworkCopyProxiesForURL((CFURLRef)[self url], (CFDictionaryRef)proxySettings)) autorelease]; // Now check to see if the proxy settings contained a PAC url, we need to run the script to get the real list of proxies if so NSDictionary *settings = [proxies objectAtIndex:0]; if ([settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyAutoConfigurationURLKey]) { [self setPACurl:[settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyAutoConfigurationURLKey]]; [self fetchPACFile]; return NO; } } if (!proxies) { [self setReadStream:nil]; [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileBuildingRequestType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Unable to obtain information on proxy servers needed for request",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]]; return NO; } // I don't really understand why the dictionary returned by CFNetworkCopyProxiesForURL uses different key names from CFNetworkCopySystemProxySettings/SCDynamicStoreCopyProxies // and why its key names are documented while those we actually need to use don't seem to be (passing the kCF* keys doesn't seem to work) if ([proxies count] > 0) { NSDictionary *settings = [proxies objectAtIndex:0]; [self setProxyHost:[settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyHostNameKey]]; [self setProxyPort:[[settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyPortNumberKey] intValue]]; [self setProxyType:[settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyTypeKey]]; } } return YES;} Ë∏èÁ†¥ÈìÅÈûãÊó†ËßÖÂ§Ñ‚Ä¶ Âà§Êñ≠ iphone ÊòØÂê¶ËÆæÁΩÆÁΩëÁªú‰ª£ÁêÜÁöÑÁ§∫‰æã‰ª£Á†ÅÂ¶Ç‰∏ã: 12345678910111213141516171819202122+ (BOOL)hasSetProxy{ BOOL proxy = NO; NSDictionary *proxySettings = (__bridge NSDictionary *)(CFNetworkCopySystemProxySettings()); NSURL *url = [NSURL URLWithString:@"http://www.baidu.com"]; NSArray *proxies = (__bridge NSArray *)(CFNetworkCopyProxiesForURL((__bridge CFURLRef)(url), (__bridge CFDictionaryRef)(proxySettings))); MZLOG(@"proxies:%@", proxies); NSDictionary *settings = proxies[0]; MZLOG(@"kCFProxyHostNameKey: %@", [settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyHostNameKey]); MZLOG(@"kCFProxyPortNumberKey: %@", [settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyPortNumberKey]); MZLOG(@"kCFProxyTypeKey: %@", [settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyTypeKey]); if ([[settings objectForKey:(NSString *)kCFProxyTypeKey] isEqualToString:@"kCFProxyTypeNone"]) { proxy = NO; } else { proxy = YES; } return proxy;} Áî®Êà∑‰ΩìÈ™åÂà§Êñ≠Â¶ÇÊûúËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫Ü‰ª£ÁêÜ, ÊèêÁ§∫Áî®Êà∑, Â∏Æ‰ªñÁõ¥Êé•Ë∑≥Âà∞ wifi ËÆæÁΩÆÁïåÈù¢. ‰∏ãÈù¢ËØ¥ËØ¥Â¶Ç‰ΩïË∑≥Âà∞Á≥ªÁªüÁöÑ wifi ËÆæÁΩÆÁïåÈù¢. 1.ÈÖçÁΩÆ URL TYPES Ê≥®ÊÑèËøôÈáåÁöÑÈÖçÁΩÆÊòØ prefs. 2.openURL 1234567891011121314NSString * urlString = @"prefs:root=WIFI";NSURL *url = [NSURL URLWithString:urlString];UIApplication *app = [UIApplication sharedApplication];if ([app canOpenURL:[NSURL URLWithString:urlString]]) { if ([[UIDevice currentDevice].systemVersion doubleValue] >= 10.0) { [app openURL:url options:@{} completionHandler:nil]; } else { [app openURL:url]; }} Âè¶Â§ñ, Ë∑≥ËΩ¨Âà∞Á≥ªÁªüÂÖ∂‰ªñÁïåÈù¢ÁöÑ URL Â¶Ç‰∏ã: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627281.Á≥ªÁªüËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=INTERNET_TETHERING2.WIFIËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=WIFI3.ËìùÁâôËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=Bluetooth4.Á≥ªÁªüÈÄöÁü•prefs:root=NOTIFICATIONS_ID5.ÈÄöÁî®ËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=General6.ÊòæÁ§∫ËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=DISPLAY&BRIGHTNESS7.Â£ÅÁ∫∏ËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=Wallpaper8.Â£∞Èü≥ËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=Sounds9.ÈöêÁßÅËÆæÁΩÆprefs:root=privacy10.ÊâìÂºÄ APP Storeprefs:root=STORE11.ÊâìÂºÄ Notesprefs:root=NOTES12.ÊâìÂºÄ Safariprefs:root=Safari13.ÊâìÂºÄ Musicprefs:root=MUSIC14.ÊâìÂºÄ photoprefs:root=Photos
